cards.name: Crack Shot
cards.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, before the Neutralize Results step, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to cancel 1<nonbreak><evade> result.

cards.name: Daredevil
cards.ability_text: While you perform a white <boost> action, you may treat it as red to use the [1<nonbreak><leftturn>] or [1<nonbreak><rightturn>] template instead.

cards.name: Debris Gambit
cards.ability_text: While you perform a red <evade> action, if there is an obstacle at range 0–1, treat the action as white instead.

cards.name: Elusive
cards.ability_text: While you defend, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to reroll 1 defense die.<return>After you fully execute a red maneuver, recover 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.

cards.name: Expert Handling
cards.ability_text: <flavor>While heavy fighters can often be coaxed into a barrel roll, seasoned pilots know how to do it without putting undue stress on their craft or leaving themselves open to attack.</flavor>

cards.name: Fearless
cards.ability_text: While you perform a <frontarc> primary attack, if the attack range is 1 and you are in the defender’s <frontarc>, you may change 1 of your results to a <hit> result.

cards.name: Intimidation
cards.ability_text: While an enemy ship at range 0 defends, it rolls 1 fewer defense die.

cards.name: Juke
cards.ability_text: While you perform an attack, if you are evading, you may change 1 of the defender’s <evade> results to a <focus> result.

cards.name: •Lone Wolf
cards.ability_text: While you defend or perform an attack, if there are no other friendly ships at range 0–2, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to reroll 1 of your dice.

cards.name: Marksmanship
cards.ability_text: While you perform an attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, you may change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result.

cards.name: Outmaneuver
cards.ability_text: While you perform a <frontarc> attack, if you are not in the defender’s firing arc, the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die.

cards.name: Predator
cards.ability_text: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your <bullseye>, you may reroll 1 attack die.

cards.name: Ruthless
cards.ability_text: While you perform an attack, you may choose another friendly ship at range 0–1 of the defender. If you do, that ship suffers 1<nonbreak><hit> damage and you may change 1 of your die results to a <hit> result.

cards.name: Saturation Salvo
cards.ability_text: While you perform a <torpedo> or <missile> attack, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> from that upgrade. If you do, choose two defense dice. The defender must reroll those dice.

cards.name: Selfless
cards.ability_text: While another friendly ship at range 0–1 defends, before the Neutralize Results step, if you are in the attack arc, you may suffer 1<nonbreak><crit> damage to cancel 1<nonbreak><crit> result.

cards.name: •Squad Leader
cards.ability_text: While you coordinate, the ship you choose can perform an action only if that action is also on your action bar.

cards.name: Swarm Tactics
cards.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1. If you do, that ship treats its initiative as equal to yours until the end of the round.

cards.name: Trick Shot
cards.ability_text: While you perform an attack that is obstructed by an obstacle, roll 1 additional attack die.

cards.name: Heightened Perception
cards.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge>. If you do, engage at initiative 7 instead of your standard initiative value this phase.

cards.name: Instinctive Aim
cards.ability_text: While you perform a special attack, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to ignore the <focus> or <targetlock> requirement.

cards.name: Sense
cards.ability_text: During the System Phase, you may choose 1 ship at range 0–1 and look at its dial. If you spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge>, you may choose a ship at range 0–3 instead.

cards.name: Supernatural Reflexes
cards.ability_text: Before you activate, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to perform a <barrelroll> or <boost> action. Then, if you performed an action you do not have on your action bar, suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage.

cards.name: Advanced Sensors
cards.ability_text: After you reveal your dial, you may perform 1 action.<return>If you do, you cannot perform another action during your activation.

cards.name: Collision Detector
cards.ability_text: While you boost or barrel roll, you can move through and overlap obstacles.<return>After you move through or overlap an obstacle, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to ignore its effects until the end of the round.

cards.name: Fire-Control System
cards.ability_text: While you perform an attack, if you have a lock on the defender, you may reroll 1 attack die. If you do, you cannot spend your lock during this attack.

cards.name: Trajectory Simulator
cards.ability_text: During the System Phase, if you would drop or launch a bomb, you may launch it using the [5<nonbreak><straight>] template instead.

cards.name: Heavy Laser Cannon
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> After the Modify Attack Dice step, change all <crit> results to <hit> results.

cards.name: Ion Cannon
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If this attack hits, spend 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> result to cause the defender to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. All remaining <hit>/<crit> results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

cards.name: Jamming Beam
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If this attack hits, all <hit>/<crit> results inflict jam tokens instead of damage.

cards.name: Tractor Beam
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If this attack hits, all <hit>/<crit> results inflict tractor tokens instead of damage.

cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack</smallcaps>

cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack:</smallcaps> If this attack hits, spend 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> result to cause the defender to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. All remaining <hit>/<crit> results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. Change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result.

cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If this attack hits, spend 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> result to cause the defender to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. All remaining <hit>/<crit> results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

cards.name: Proton Torpedoes
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. Change 1<nonbreak><hit> result to a <crit> result.

cards.name: Barrage Rockets
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<focus>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If the defender is in your <bullseye>, you may spend 1 or more <standardcharge> to reroll that many attack dice.

cards.name: Cluster Missiles
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After this attack, you may perform this attack as a bonus attack against a different target at range 0–1 of the defender, ignoring the <targetlock> requirement.

cards.name: Concussion Missiles
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After this attack hits, each ship at range 0–1 of the defender exposes 1 of its damage cards.

cards.name: Homing Missiles
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. After you declare the defender, the defender may choose to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. If it does, skip the Attack and Defense Dice steps and the attack is treated as hitting.

cards.name: Ion Missiles
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<targetlock>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If this attack hits, spend 1<nonbreak><hit> or <crit> result to cause the defender to suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage. All remaining <hit>/<crit> results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

cards.name: Proton Rockets
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Attack (<focus>):</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.

cards.name: Freelance Slicer
cards.ability_text: While you defend, before attack dice are rolled, you may spend a lock you have on the attacker to roll 1 attack die. If you do, the attacker gains 1 jam token. Then, on a <hit> or <crit> result, gain 1 jam token.

cards.name: GNK “Gonk” Droid
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> Lose 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.<return><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Recover 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.<return><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to recover 1 shield.

cards.name: •Informant
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Setup:</smallcaps> After placing forces, choose 1 enemy ship and assign the <smallcaps>Listening Device</smallcaps> condition to it.

cards.name: Novice Technician
cards.ability_text: At the end of the round, you may roll 1 attack die to repair 1 faceup damage card. Then on a <hit> result, expose 1 damage card.

cards.name: Perceptive Copilot
cards.ability_text: After you perform a <focus> action, gain 1 focus token.

cards.name: Seasoned Navigator
cards.ability_text: After you reveal your dial, you may set your dial to another non-red maneuver of the same speed. While you execute that maneuver, increase its difficulty.

cards.name: Tactical Officer
cards.ability_text: <flavor>In the chaos of a starfighter battle, a single order can mean the difference between a victory and a massacre.</flavor>

cards.name: Hotshot Gunner
cards.ability_text: While you perform a <turretarc> attack, after the Modify Defense Dice step, the defender removes 1 focus or calculate token.

cards.name: Skilled Bombardier
cards.ability_text: If you would drop or launch a device, you may use a template of the same bearing with a speed 1 higher or lower.

cards.name: Veteran Tail Gunner

cards.name: Veteran Turret Gunner

cards.name: R2 Astromech
cards.ability_text: After you reveal your dial, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> and gain 1 disarm token to recover 1 shield.

cards.name: R3 Astromech
cards.ability_text: You can maintain up to 2 locks. Each lock must be on a different object.<return>After you perform a <targetlock> action, you may acquire a lock.

cards.name: R4 Astromech
cards.ability_text: Decrease the difficulty of your speed 1–2 basic maneuvers (<leftturn>, <leftbank>, <straight>, <rightbank>, <rightturn>).

cards.name: R5 Astromech
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to repair 1 facedown damage card.<return><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Repair 1 faceup <bitalic>Ship</bitalic> damage card.

cards.name: •Cloaking Device
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to perform a <cloak> action.<return>At the start of the Planning Phase, roll 1 attack die. On a <focus> result, decloak or discard your cloak token.

cards.name: Contraband Cybernetics
cards.ability_text: Before you activate, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, until the end of the round, you can perform actions and execute red maneuvers, even while stressed.

cards.name: Deadman’s Switch
cards.ability_text: After you are destroyed, each other ship at range 0–1 suffers 1<nonbreak><hit> damage.

cards.name: Feedback Array
cards.ability_text: Before you engage, you may gain 1 ion token and 1 disarm token. If you do, each ship at range 0 suffers 1<nonbreak><hit> damage.

cards.name: Inertial Dampeners
cards.ability_text: Before you would execute a maneuver, you may spend 1 shield. If you do, execute a white [0<nonbreak><stop>] instead of the maneuver you revealed, then gain 1 stress token.

cards.name: Rigged Cargo Chute
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. Drop 1 loose cargo using the [1<nonbreak><straight>] template.

cards.name: Ablative Plating
cards.ability_text: Before you would suffer damage from an obstacle or from a friendly bomb detonating, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>. If you do, prevent 1 damage.

cards.name: Advanced SLAM
cards.ability_text: After you perform a <slam> action, if you fully executed the maneuver, you may perform a white action on your action bar, treating that action as red.

cards.name: Afterburners
cards.ability_text: After you fully execute a speed 3–5 maneuver, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to perform a <boost> action, even while stressed.

cards.name: Electronic Baffle
cards.ability_text: During the End Phase, you may suffer 1<nonbreak><hit> damage to remove 1 red token.

cards.name: Engine Upgrade
cards.ability_text: <flavor>Large military forces such as the Galactic Empire have standardized engines, but individual pilots and small organizations often replace the power couplings, add thrusters, or use high-performance fuel to get extra push out of their engines.</flavor>

cards.name: Hull Upgrade
cards.ability_text: <flavor>For those who cannot afford an enhanced shield generator, bolting additional plates onto the hull of a ship can serve as an adequate substitute.</flavor>

cards.name: Munitions Failsafe
cards.ability_text: While you perform a <torpedo> or <missile> attack, after rolling attack dice, you may cancel all dice results to recover 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> you spent as a cost for the attack.

cards.name: Shield Upgrade
cards.ability_text: <flavor>Deflector shields are a substantial line of defense on most starships beyond the lightest fighters. While enhancing a ship’s shield capacity can be costly, all but the most confident or reckless pilots see the value in this sort of investment.</flavor>

cards.name: Static Discharge Vanes
cards.ability_text: Before you would gain 1 ion or jam token, if you are not stressed, you may choose another ship at range 0–1 and gain 1 stress token. If you do, the chosen ship gains that ion or jam token instead, then you suffer 1 <hit> damage.

cards.name: Stealth Device
cards.ability_text: While you defend, if your <standardcharge> is active, roll 1 additional defense die.<return>After you suffer damage, lose 1<nonbreak><standardcharge>.

cards.name: Tactical Scrambler
cards.ability_text: While you obstruct an enemy ship’s attack, the defender rolls 1 additional defense die.

cards.name: •Baze Malbus

cards.name: •C-3PO
cards.ability_text: <smallbody>Before rolling defense dice, you may spend 1 calculate token to guess aloud a number 1 or higher. If you do and you roll exactly that many <evade> results, add 1<nonbreak><evade> result.</smallbody><return><smallbody>After you perform the <calculate> action, gain 1 calculate token.</smallbody>

cards.name: •Ezra Bridger

cards.name: •Han Solo

cards.name: •Luke Skywalker
cards.ability_text: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may spend 1<nonbreak><forcecharge> to rotate your <turretarc> indicator.

cards.name: •“Chopper”
cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1 non-recurring <nonbreak><standardcharge> from another equipped upgrade to recover 1 shield. <return><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 2 shields to recover 1 non-recurring <standardcharge> on an equipped upgrade.

cards.ability_text: After you reveal your dial, you may spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> and gain 1 disarm token to recover 1 shield.

cards.ability_text: <smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Spend 1<nonbreak><standardcharge> to repair 1 facedown damage card.<return><smallcaps>Action:</smallcaps> Repair 1 faceup <bitalic>Ship</bitalic> damage card.

cards.ability_text: While you defend, if you are evading, you may reroll 1 defense die.
